special_text:
[+1]: Until your next turn, spells you cast cost {2} less to cast. 
[-3]: [b][Choose two target creatures controlled by different players. Return one of them to its owner’s hand and that creature deals damage equal to its power to the other creature.][/b]
[-7]: You get an emblem with “Whenever a creature enters, this emblem deals 3 damage to each opponent.”
Flash technique {G}{U}{R} [i](You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for its technique cost.)[/i]
